event.title: is located at 40°52′55″N 85°29′44″W. According to the 2010

data.event: Huntington is located at 40°52′55″N 85°29′44″W. According to the 2010 census, Huntington has a total area of 8.844 square miles (22.91 km2), of which 8.71 square miles (22.56 km2) (or 98.48%) is land and 0.134 square miles (0.35 km2) (or 1.52%) is water.
